document_data.caption: An unwilling victim entering into Tasirin's Haunted Sleep.
document_data.name: Tasirin's Haunted Sleep
document_data.mainbody: '''''Tasirin's haunted sleep''''' was an [[Arcane magic|arcane]] [[enchantment]] [[spell]] that put a target into a supernatural deep sleep.
document_data.Effects: Once this spell was cast upon the target, and short of the caster ending the spell, only a ''[[wish]]'', ''[[limited wish]]'', or successful ''[[dispel magic]]'' could rouse the target from their slumber. The spell could only be used on a target that was already asleep. The target was susceptible from suggestions received in their dreams as visions designed by the caster. Upon their waking they felt a strong compulsion to comply with the suggestion.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.History: This spell was found within the ''[[Treatise of Sublimated Oneiromancy]]''.{{Cite dragon/82/Spells between the covers|58}}
